ygData.subject: Explaining and looking
ygData.msgSnippet: (I have Noble/Savage? I know I sent in the app, but I thought he had been denied since he isn t up on the char page. Anyway, I ll use him in a bit.) Vulois

(I have Noble/Savage? I know I sent in the app, but I thought he had 
been denied since he isn't up on the char page. Anyway, I'll use him 
in a bit.)

Vulois turned to Child.

"Good, now help me romove these computer boards. We are moving 
everything and I.."

A strange thought popped into Vulois' head. A thought of confusion. 
Than Convix spoke.

Confusion. The air one and the sea one are mislead about a meeting. 
Correct this.

Vulois had been noticing lately that Convix had not been talking 
clearly the last few days. He probably knew why: It is stretching 
most of it's power towards Child. Once the training begins, he'll 
need a Convix too. He'll just have to figure this riddle out.

The air one and sea one, he thought. Who do I know who is...I know! 
Battera's a bat, so she must be air. And CyberSHARK! Okay, so their 
confused. About a meeting? The Peace Talks! That's it!

"Hold on a second Child," and than something came over him. He hugged 
Child. "I know it seems that I'm being cruel. But you've got to 
understand that it's for your good, my good and everyone on this 
planet, and Cybertron's good." He walks away, and opens a comm to 
Battera and Cybershark.

"Guys, it's Vulois. I'm picking up some confusion from you guys about 
this peace talks. So let me just say some stuff, and than you can ask 
questions. We're moving everything to our old Mountain Base. That is 
where we'll be holding our conference. I want you guys to keep 
talking to the leaders, and than when you are finaly ready, come back 
to the mountain, not the embassy. We won't be leaving for a week, so 
don't go now. Keep talking to the leaders. The reason I'm moving is 
because of fear and attack. Plus we have 5 new guys to our team, that 
you have to meet. Their's Child, and Windrazor and The Peace Angels. 
Oh and...(Vulois pauses and thinks)...I don't know if you gys know, 
but....Soundwave died. He was talking to Zardus, and he didn't want 
to come and so he killed him! He died valiently, in the service of 
our mission. He will always be remembered. And don't get discuraged 
about Zardus. I'm going to see him, with Child and Windrazor. Now, if 
you have any questions, just ask."


Fliq

Fliq continued to look for Ramulus.

"Ramulus! Where'd you get to? Don't tell me you got lost! Ramulus!!"
